gw.api.database

Class IDeleteBuilder

  • gw.api.database.IDeleteBuilder

  • public class IDeleteBuilder
    Deletes rows from the given table

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      ISimpleQueryBuilder<Bean> Query
      the query portion of the operation

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int execute()
      Executes the query. If already in a transaction, the query executes in that transaction; otherwise a new transaction is created and committed when the method returns, or rolled back if the method throws an exception.
      IDeleteBuilder withDescription(String descriptionForTheQuery)
      Sets a string describing the query. Useful for debugging performance issues.
      IDeleteBuilder withEvictFromGlobalCache(boolean shouldEvict)
      If the update is successful, the affected beans will be evicted from the global cache. Note that this can be expensive.
      IDeleteBuilder withLogSQL(boolean logSQL)
      Turns on or off SQL logging. The query is logged to the PLLoggerCategory.SERVER_DATABASE log category at the info level

    • Field Detail

      • Query

        ISimpleQueryBuilder<Bean> Query
        the query portion of the operation

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        int execute()
        Executes the query. If already in a transaction, the query executes in that transaction; otherwise a new transaction is created and committed when the method returns, or rolled back if the method throws an exception.
        Returns:
        the number of rows affected

        Sets a string describing the query. Useful for debugging performance issues.

        Returns:

        IDeleteBuilder withEvictFromGlobalCache(boolean shouldEvict)
        If the update is successful, the affected beans will be evicted from the global cache. Note that this can be expensive.
        Parameters:
        shouldEvict -
        Returns:
        this

        IDeleteBuilder withLogSQL(boolean logSQL)
        Turns on or off SQL logging. The query is logged to the PLLoggerCategory.SERVER_DATABASE log category at the info level
        Parameters:
        logSQL - true to log SQL, false to not
        Returns:
        the this ptr
